Key Match Events: Niclas Füllkrug scored the opening goal from Jamal Musiala's assist in the 27th minute.
Jamal Musiala scored on a breakaway in the 58th minute, completing a quick counter-attack from a corner.
Florian Wirtz scored in the 66th minute after a one-two with Musiala.
Kai Havertz hit the crossbar with a header in the 33rd and fired narrowly wide in first half stoppage time.
Kai Havertz scored the final goal with a 81st minute penalty.
Post-Match Reflections: Niclas Füllkrug praised Jamal Musiala's form, stating it was 'fun to watch that today.'
Füllkrug mentioned the team made a lot of deep runs and controlled the game even without possession.
